name: MKey Medley
description:
v0.2.2 (24/6/2021) : fix bug mini-avoidance and completed stage 1, add effect after clear stage, nerf Re:Fresh screen
Completed after ~2 weeks, only one stage with 10 screens, 1 miniboss, 1 minigame, 1 mini avoidance ( NO MAIN BOSS ON MY GAME )
It's medley like K2, but i changed some content:
- Classify game : 3 needle screen, 3 trap screen, 3 gimmick screen, 1 minigame, 1 miniboss, 1 mini avoidance each stage
- No title card: For information of the original game, you can press I
It will take a very long time to complete next version and there is no specific release date, but it can complete soon ( and yeah still have some bug about room transfer, and information of game, i will fix later, or big demo )
Thanks Zeno, RandomFangamer, and some of my friend for become tester of this demo
Have fun !!!
